name: BaseEvent
description: The `BaseEvent` class is the foundational class for all events in JSMacros. Every event that can be listened to or triggered in JSMacros extends this class, providing common functionality for event handling, cancellation, and metadata access.
overview: BaseEvent serves as the parent class for all JSMacros events, including game events like `EventTick`, `EventSound`, `EventPlayerJoin`, and many others. It provides essential methods for event management that are available across all event types.

methods.name: cancellable
methods.description: Determines if the current event can be cancelled

methods.name: joinable
methods.description: Determines if the current event is joinable (can be combined with other events)

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Attempts to cancel the current event

methods.name: isCanceled
methods.description: Checks if the current event has been cancelled

methods.name: getEventName
methods.description: Returns the name of the event as defined in the `@Event` annotation

methods.name: trigger
methods.description: Manually triggers the event through the current profile
